title: Scp 8642 19
content:
You insist on getting more information about the Reality Anchors. After all, it’s your job as an auditor to make sure funds aren’t being wasted at the Foundation. Unfortunately, no one seems forthcoming with information. Putting on the bravest face you can muster, you march confidently toward the mysterious double doors, convinced that whatever is going on here has to do with what’s behind them.

Then you hear the sound of a gun being cocked behind you.

Turning swiftly, you come face-to-face with the barrel of a revolver. Hannah’s eyes glare at you from behind the sights, and you can see in them that she knows how to use her weapon. “You’re awfully curious for an auditor,” she remarks. “Well whether you really are one or not, you’re in too deep now for a happy ending.” You see the trio moving toward you out of the corner of your eye, and you know you’d have no chance in a fight; your only choice is to run. With mere seconds to decide, you…

||= [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8642/offset/18 Try to escape through the doors you entered from.]||= 19||= [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8642/offset/20 Try to escape through the mysterious double doors.]||
